response: Simple Onion Omelette: Whisk 2 eggs, chop 1 onion. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions until soft, pour in eggs. Cook until set, fold, and serve with salt and pepper. Serves 1.
Chicken Fried Rice: Cook 1 cup rice. Stir-fry 200g chicken, add veggies, mix with rice, and season. Serves 2.
Tomato Pasta: Boil pasta, sauté tomatoes in oil, add herbs, mix pasta, and sprinkle cheese. Serves 1.
Masala Fries: Slice potatoes, coat with salt and chili powder, deep-fry until crisp. Serves 2.
Matar Paneer: Fry paneer cubes, add peas and tomato gravy, simmer with spices. Serves 3.
Rice Kheer: Boil rice in milk, add sugar and cardamom, simmer until thick. Serve chilled. Serves 2.
Dal Fry: Cook lentils, prepare tomato-onion tadka, mix and simmer. Serve with rice. Serves 3.
French Toast: Whisk eggs with sugar and milk, dip bread slices, toast in butter. Serves 2.
Paneer Tikka: Marinate paneer with yogurt and spices, grill with onions and capsicum. Serves 2.
Cabbage Stir Fry: Sauté shredded cabbage and carrot in oil with mustard seeds. Serves 2.
Garlic Mushrooms: Sauté mushrooms in butter with garlic and herbs. Serves 1.
Lemon Fish Fry: Marinate fish with lemon juice and spices, shallow-fry till golden. Serves 2.
Aloo Matar Curry: Cook diced potatoes and peas in tomato gravy with cumin. Serves 3.
Chana Masala: Boil chickpeas, sauté onions and tomatoes, mix with spices. Serves 3.
Palak Paneer: Blend cooked spinach, add paneer cubes, simmer with cream. Serves 3.
Egg Fried Rice: Cook rice, scramble eggs, mix with soy sauce and vegetables. Serves 2.
Tomato Bruschetta: Toast bread, top with chopped tomatoes, basil, and olive oil. Serves 2.
Banana Milkshake: Blend banana with milk and sugar, serve chilled. Serves 1.
Honey Oats Bowl: Cook oats in milk, drizzle with honey and nuts. Serves 1.
Cheesy Corn: Boil corn, mix with butter and grated cheese, season with salt. Serves 2.
Tomato Scrambled Eggs: Sauté tomatoes, add beaten eggs, cook soft, season with pepper. Serves 1.
Curd Rice: Mix cooked rice with curd, add mustard seeds and curry leaves tempering. Serves 2.
Cheese Pasta: Boil pasta, mix with butter, cheese, and pepper. Serves 1.
Veg Noodles: Stir-fry veggies, add boiled noodles, mix with soy sauce. Serves 2.
Cold Coffee: Blend milk, coffee, sugar, and ice cubes, serve chilled. Serves 1.
Fresh Salad: Chop cucumber and tomato, sprinkle salt and lemon juice. Serves 1.
Aloo Sandwich: Mash boiled potatoes with spices, stuff in bread, toast till golden. Serves 2.
Apple Smoothie: Blend apple with milk and honey, serve chilled. Serves 1.
Egg Sandwich: Boil eggs, mash with mayo, stuff between toasted bread slices. Serves 2.
Lemon Rice: Mix cooked rice with lemon juice and mustard seed tempering. Serves 2.
Paneer Bhurji: Crumble paneer, cook with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Serves 2.
Aloo Tamatar Curry: Cook potatoes in tomato gravy with cumin and turmeric. Serves 2.
Garlic Bread: Mix butter with garlic, spread on bread, toast until crispy. Serves 2.
Veg Maggi: Cook noodles, add sautéed vegetables and seasoning mix. Serves 1.
Cheese Omelette: Whisk eggs, add cheese, cook until fluffy and golden. Serves 1.
Spinach Corn Stir Fry: Cook spinach and corn with garlic and cream. Serves 2.
Tomato Rice: Fry onions and tomatoes, mix with rice and spices. Serves 2.
Chicken Pasta: Boil pasta, toss with grilled chicken and tomato sauce. Serves 2.
Egg Curry: Boil eggs, cook with onion-tomato gravy, serve with rice. Serves 2.
Butter Paneer: Cook paneer in creamy tomato-butter gravy with garam masala. Serves 3.
Fish Curry: Cook fish pieces in coconut gravy, serve hot with rice. Serves 2.
Dal Tadka: Boil lentils, temper with ghee, garlic, and cumin, serve with rice. Serves 2.
Hot Chocolate: Heat milk, mix cocoa and sugar, whisk and serve hot. Serves 1.
Tomato Toast: Spread tomato puree on bread, add cheese, and bake lightly. Serves 1.
Aloo Peas Dry: Fry boiled potatoes with peas, cumin, and turmeric. Serves 2.
Cucumber Curd Rice: Mix rice with curd, add grated cucumber and tempering. Serves 2.
Chicken Curry: Cook chicken with onion-tomato masala and spices. Serve hot. Serves 3.
Mutton Masala: Pressure cook mutton with onion gravy, add garam masala. Serves 3.
Rava Kesari: Roast rava, cook in sugar syrup with ghee and saffron. Serves 3.
Coconut Rice: Cook rice, mix with grated coconut and curry leaf tempering. Serves 2.
